      • enemyWorldSetup

        protected void enemyWorldSetup()
        Look at each room as a 12x7 grid Each grid space will have a value: - Walls/Walls will have a value of - The player's location will be at a value of 100 - The grid value will decrease as it goes further from the player i.e. 98 99 98 99 100 99 98 99 98
